name: Way to the Flag
description:
Made for the gdevelop game jam #2 themed pets or companions.

A short and simple game where you have to reach the flag with your friend.

Controls:

Player 1 - arrow keys and spacebar to jump.

player 2 - WASD and J to jump.

Liluo.io link:

https://liluo.io/diamspher/way-to-the-flag
